nodes.text: Vigro was a male Neimoidian speeder-repairman who lived on the planet of Cato Neimoidia during the early years of the Galactic Empire. He owned the landspeeder repair shop Vigro's Repulsorlifts, which was located in the city Zarra.
A paranoid individual, Vigro had a mistrust of outsiders and was convinced that his customers were all trying to swindle him.
